Great work!', 'The competition was tight, and the design by Mr/ Kautzmann really made me feel like he was able to capture the message within the image.  Grateful for his work - thank you!', 'Very helpful; and open to my design ideas. Would love to work with again. Thanks!', 'A great artist indeed! Much appreciated, thank you.', "exceeded my expectations 10x. loved it and couldn't have turned out better! ", "Mr. Kautzmann was professional and very helpful in editing the final logo. We love our new logo and can't wait to start using it!", 'Excelente profissional ...  ', 'Out of everyone submitting ideas to this, Mr. Kautzmann was probably the most industrious. He provided tons of ideas and variations, and gave me plenty to choose from. He was very receptive to feedback and provided professional results.', 'Great work! Mr. Kautzmann read my brief and delivered exactly what I hoped for but could not imagine for myself - a very simple, applicable, and powerful logo. He also responded quickly to my feedback.', 'Great to work with!\rI highly recommend!', 'We have worked on three projects together. Last year he did one and then I came back this year and  invited him to two more contests. He is creative, listens well, and thoughtful.\rHe made this an easy experience. I would highly recommend him!', 'It was a pleasure working with Mr. Kautzmann! He is a very professional, creative and talented designer!', 'Mr. Kautzmann went further than most entrants by coming up with an original take on the brief. He worked with me to produce a version that met my requirements exactly. He was willing to give his opinion, which was very helpful.', 'Mr Kautzmann was excellent!  I approached him to look at my needs after his work  had been chosen by a friend for a logo.  Mr. Kautzmann was easy to communicate with and  received feed back well. ', 'Great communication, fast feedback, and quick adjustments.\rGreat patience and great stylish design. \rWe are 100% satisfied!\rThank you Mr Kautzmann! \rBest regards from Sweden!', 'Mr. Kautzmann is great to work with.  He listens to suggestions and is eager to please.  I highly suggest working with him on any projects you may have.  he understands less is more and creates beautiful and elegant designs.  A+']

about:
Designer from Ukraine.
  37 years
  Since 2009 I have been working as a freelance graphic designer.
  In my work I am guided by the main rule: "originality and practicality".
  Design should speak for itself. I do not use overused-overdone concepts, clipart’s or stock images at my work, except the customer request (within copyright).

about: Hey!  I'm Artmin, I am a Graphic Designer specializing in Illustrations and identity design. I've been exploring and experimenting with creative art since I was a child. I enjoy new and challenging projects that push and challenge me to evolve and learn in the field of design. I've had a lot of exposure in the field of design and have been working professionally for the past 6 years. I create clean, fun and appealing designs which comply with the latest design standards.

about:
Architect, designer, visual artist. As Graphic Design is an important suite of architectural presentation, i developed highly approved skills during my studies. Currently i am working as a freelancer in graphic design.
  More active on 99d since December 2017. I am available for 1-1 projects. If you are interested in clean, original designs please feel free to contact me.

about: I'm a graphic designer, illustrator and teacher, with more than 20 years of experience. My focus is on logo design, corporate identity and branding, working for many big brand names as well as smaller companies, organizations and start-ups, to produce high-quality design that not only looks great, but effectively does the job it is indented to do. Please contact me for 1-to-1 projects if you like my work.

about:
Hi! My name is Kristina and I'm glad to see you in my portfolio. I'm graphic designer with big passion to logo design. I like to create bold and strong logos which would be unique and memorable. I like logos which have a great idea and strong realization.
  You can see more my works here:
www.behance.net/camaxtli

  Our vision is to see all designs through our customer's eyes.

about:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my page.
  I specialize in logo design. I strive for simplicity and minimalism in my design style. At the same time, I try to express the essence of your company in my logos. My catchy logos are simple in the perception and can lead your business to success.
  If you need the logo design done, feel free to contact me.

about:

about:

about:
A logo doesn't sell, it identifies.
  A logo derives its meaning from the quality of the thing it symbolizes, not the other way around.
  A logo is less important than the product it signifies, its meaning is more important than what it looks like. - PAUL RAND

about: Hello! My name is Tara, and I am a veteran graphic designer of 11 years and a certified Adobe Illustrator master. I specialize in branding, logo, and social media design with a focus on vector artwork. I am competent in a wide variety of styles, but bespoke freehand logo designs watercolor embellishments and a feminine flair are my specialty.

She was helpful, attentive, always quick to reply and responsive to every comment I gave her. A big thanks to her for her effort and genuine help. Looking forward to dealing with her soon! ', "Marie Curie was fast and very easy to work with. I'm very pleased with the results.", 'It was great working with Marie Curie. Love the logo design\rThank you for being so patient with me.\rBest Regards,\rBernard']

about: I am currently a full time freelancer designer specialized in Book Covers, Labels, Logos and Brand Identities.
tags: ['Book cover', 'Logo design', 'Product label', 'Logo & brand identity pack', 'Logo & brand guide', 'Illustration or graphics', 'T-shirt', 'Other clothing or merchandise', 'Other book or magazine']
reviews: ['He does an excellent job at hearing what the client wants and creating exactly that. Very patient and kind and easy to work with.', 'All good. I am fairly picky but without much visual imagination, so I tend to agonise over detail and not know what I want until I see it.\rIvano patently produced different versions until I was satisfied.\rStonking.', 'An absolutely fantastic designer. Very talented, very fast, very responsive to feedback and professional. Also incredibly patient and flexible! Highly recommended!', 'Thank you for everything. Great collaboration, smooth experience, and awesome outcome.', "I really liked the design that Ivanol developed and appreciate his additional creativity. He was quick to respond to my messages and is ready to make more adjustments to the design of our client's book should that be necessary before it's published.", 'Excellent imagination and creativity. Meticulously follows the project description. Produces work that others will try to imitate.', 'Ivano produced a thoughtful, creative book cover design that nailed the brief. The brief was not easy and it changed throughout the competition! He was patient with my requests and provided his opinion on different design directions. I’m excited to use ...', 'Fantastic design', 'Talented and proactive designer. Also very responsive, replies quickly to feedback.', 'IvanoL. ~Newebart~ was fantastic to work with! Great design eye and highly responsive to all requests. Highly recommend and I would happy work with Ivano again.', 'Ivano has been very professional all along the designing process: he answered all my doubts and we went along right away. He respected the brief to a tee and I think I will collaborate with him again, might I need design work in the future.', 'Great design and very responsive with feedback ', 'Very clean and professional, he hit the target on being reliable, committed, and finding the style and vision we were looking for. Definitely will recommend his skills.', 'This is the second time that I have worked with Ivano Newebart. His designs are well crafted and extremely creative. Ivano is professional and personable, willing to work with the client until the designs are perfect. A pleasure!', 'Working with Ivano Newebart to design my book cover was a great experience. This designer was always available and receptive to any change or question that I had. I would absolutely recommend him to others and hope to work with him on future projects.', "Newebart designed several cover for my new book, I'm Not Dead. There were all beautifully done. My communications with him were outstanding. An absolutely perfect job and perfect working relationship. He is outstanding!", 'Awesome job. I will work with this artist again for sure.', 'With Newebart, we were very satisfied. He understood our unusual ideas and put them into an interesting shape  and complement until we were completely satisfied. For the new projects in the future, we look forward to his proposals and participation.', "Working with Newebart was fantastic! He's a talented designer who worked hard on my project. He made changes every step of the way until the design was perfect. I wouldn't hesitate to use him again. He delivers!"]
